description: Listed building consent in connection with deconversion from 2 flats into a single family dwelling including: Installation of new kitchen to rear of ground floor; Removal of walls/internal partitions; Removal of chimney breast to 2nd floor.
decision_conditions:
1) The demolition of the 1st and 2nd floor chimney breasts is contrary to PPG 15 (the national guidance for historic buildings- See PPG 15, Annex C, Para.61), and would detract from the historic and architectural integrity of the listed building.

2) The loss of the plan form would conflict with Para. C58 (Annex C ) of PPG 15, and would detract from the character of the listed building.

3) The removal of timber-framed sash windows lack sufficient justification, or clear drawings (1:20 scale) to support their removal, or prove the character of the listed building would be preserved.
